ResearchProjectDef.label: sewage sludge composting
ResearchProjectDef.description: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-split air conditioning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build multi-split air conditioning systems with outdoor units piped to indoor units and freezers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plumbing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use pipes, plumbing fixtures, storage tanks, wind pumps and other apparatuses to deliver and drain water and sewage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heating
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build log boilers which can be used to heat rooms and can be placed adjacent to baths to heat bathwater.

ResearchProjectDef.label: central heating
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build central heating systems with radiators, hot water tanks, boilers and thermostats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: modern bathroom fixtures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build modern-style bathroom fixtures like toilets and showers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric pumps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Powered water pumps for pressurized continuous water pumping.

ResearchProjectDef.label: power showers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build power showers which halve the time spent showering and improve comfort.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smart toilets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smart toilets which are twice as water efficient as a standard toilets and provide more comfort.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hot tubs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build hot tubs which can be used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, and pleasure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial-scale pumps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build industrial-scale water pumps and storage tanks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deep wells
ResearchProjectDef.description: Drill deeper wells to access a much larger area of ground water.

ResearchProjectDef.label: washing machines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build washing machines that can wash clothes so well that you couldn't even tell someone died wearing it!

ResearchProjectDef.label: water filtration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build water filtration systems which treat the water supply, eliminating the risk of disease.

ResearchProjectDef.label: septic tanks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build septic tanks which accumulate sewage and provide moderate treatment of sewage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sewage treatment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large sewage treatment systems which accumulate large amounts of sewage and provide fast treatment of sewage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: irrigation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build sprinklers that can irrigate soil to improve fertility.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fire suppression
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build sprinklers that suppress fires with a spray of water.
